logger.doc:name: Start Log
logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { appName: app.name, flowName : flow.name, position: "Flow Start", message: "Sub flow to retrieve gameId and status started", correlationId: correlationId, timestamp: now() >> "UTC" }]

logger.doc:name: End Log
logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { appName: app.name, flowName : flow.name, position: "Flow End", message: "Sub flow to retrieve the gameId and value ended", correlationId: correlationId, timestamp: now() >> "UTC" }]
